metadata.name: Workflow for: Find me the best hotel deals in Tokyo for next mon...
metadata.description: Find me the best hotel deals in Tokyo for next month, budget around $200 per night.
metadata.question_pattern: Find me the best hotel deals in Tokyo for next month, budget around $200 per night.

nodes.name: user_query
nodes.description: Ask the user for their check-in and check-out dates.

inputs.question: What are your check-in and check-out dates for Tokyo?

nodes.name: hotel_search
nodes.description: Search for hotel options and prices in Tokyo.

nodes.name: cost_analysis
nodes.description: Analyze costs and find the best value options from the hotel options.

nodes.name: result_summarizer
nodes.description: Summarize the analysis results and present the best hotel options to the user.

inputs.user_question: Find me the best hotel deals in Tokyo for next month.

shared_store_schema.hotel_options: List of hotel options found in the search
shared_store_schema.best_value_hotels: Analysis result of the best value hotel options
shared_store_schema.hotel_deal_summary: Summary of the best hotel deals for the user
